citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), Fisheries Oceanography Coordinated Investigations (FOCI)
citeinfo.title: FOCI Discrete Sample Database

descript.abstract: Station location and sampling information from FOCI biological cruises.
descript.purpose: Multiple tasks: to create a record of cruise activity; to link related sampling via location, sampling gear, or sample type; calculate at-sea maps of data collection locations and standard catch information; track sample collection, shipping, and processing.

idinfo.accconst: Must be approved by FOCI Task Leader.
idinfo.useconst: Must be approved by FOCI task leader.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metac: Must be approved by FOCI Task Leader.
metainfo.metuc: Must be approved by FOCI task leader.
